a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Change in distribution of population between different poverty
This data is adjusted for inflation and for differences in the cost of living between countries. Data after 1981 relates to
household income or consumption surveys collated by the World Bank; before 1981 it is based on historical reconstructions of
GDP per capita and inequality data.
Note: Data is measured in international-$ at 2011 prices.
